title: WCAS MATH 300-0-31 Foundations of Higher Mathematics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Introduction to fundamental mathematical ideas - such as sets, functions, equivalence relations, and cardinal numbers - and basic techniques of writing proofs. Students may not receive credit for 300 without prior departmental consent after taking 320-1, 321-1, 330-1, or 331-1. Prerequisite: 240.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
ISBN: 978-0-9894721-0-4
Book of Proof, 2nd ed
Richard Hammock http://www.people.vcu.edu/~rhammack/BookOfProof/.
Ingram

Students can order a hard copy from Amazon or Barnes and Noble or download the pdf for free.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: May not be taken for credit after 320-1, 321-1, 330-1 or 331-1 without prior departmental consent.

subject: MATH
